title: Frozen II
des: Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land. They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom.

title: Klaus
des: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

title: Rick and Morty
des: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.

title: The Call of the Wild
des: A sled dog struggles for survival in the Alaskan wild.

title: The Lion King
des: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: Frozen
des: When the newly-crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

title: South Park
des: Follows the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.

title: The Simpsons
des: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
des: Yoda, Mace Windu, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker and other Jedi Knights lead the Grand Army of the Republic against the droid army of the Separatists.

title: BoJack Horseman
des: BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit television show "Horsin' Around" in the '80s and '90s, now he's washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

title: Toy Story 4
des: When a new toy called "Forky" joins Woody and the gang, a road trip alongside old and new friends reveals how big the world can be for a toy.

title: Spies in Disguise
des: When the world's best spy is turned into a pigeon, he must rely on his nerdy tech officer to save the world.

title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge on the Run
des: After SpongeBob's beloved pet snail Gary is snail-napped, he and Patrick embark on an epic adventure to The Lost City of Atlantic City to bring Gary home.

title: Big Mouth
des: Teenage friends find their lives upended by the wonders and horrors of puberty.

title: The Lion King
des: A Lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile in despair, only to learn in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.

title: Family Guy
des: In a wacky Rhode Island town, a dysfunctional family strive to cope with everyday life as they are thrown from one crazy scenario to another.

title: Star Wars Rebels
des: A brave and clever ragtag starship crew stands up against the evil Empire as it tightens its grip on the galaxy and hunts down the last of the Jedi Knights.

title: Gargoyles
des: A clan of heroic night creatures pledge to protect modern New York City as they did in Scotland one thousand years earlier.

title: Bob's Burgers
des: Bob Belcher, along with his wife and 3 children, try to run their last hope of holding the family together, which is running Bob's dream restaurant.

title: Green Eggs and Ham
des: An animated series based on the popular Dr. Seuss story "Green Eggs and Ham."

title: Trolls World Tour
des: Sequel to the 2016 animated hit.

title: Dr. Seuss' The Grinch
des: A grumpy Grinch plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
des: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his reality, crossing his path with five counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

title: The Addams Family
des: The eccentrically macabre family moves to a bland suburb where Wednesday Addams' friendship with the daughter of a hostile and conformist local reality show host exacerbates conflict between the families.

title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
des: The flightless birds and scheming green pigs take their feud to the next level.

title: Scoob!
des: Scooby and the gang face their most challenging mystery ever: a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As they race to stop this dogpocalypse, the gang discovers that Scooby has an epic destiny greater than anyone imagined.

title: Aladdin
des: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

title: Zootopia
des: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
des: In a war-torn world of elemental magic, a young boy reawakens to undertake a dangerous mystic quest to fulfill his destiny as the Avatar, and bring peace to the world.

title: The Little Mermaid
des: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

title: Inside Out
des: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

title: Attack on Titan
des: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Yeager vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

title: Moana
des: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

title: Tangled
des: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

title: Lady and the Tramp

title: A Bug's Life
des: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

title: The Dragon Prince
des: Two human princes forge an unlikely bond with the elfin assassin sent to kill them, embarking on an epic quest to bring peace to their warring lands.

title: Coco
des: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

title: Monsters, Inc.
des: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, 2 monsters realize things may not be what they think.

title: Ratatouille
des: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

title: Toy Story
des: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
des: When Hiccup discovers Toothless isn't the only Night Fury, he must seek "The Hidden World", a secret Dragon Utopia before a hired tyrant named Grimmel finds it first.

title: How to Train Your Dragon Homecoming
des: Hiccup and Toothless reunite to remind both their kinds of the inseparable bond between vikings and dragons.

title: Cars
des: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

title: The AristoCats
des: With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.

title: BoBoiBoy Movie 2
des: BoBoiBoy and his friends have been attacked by a villain named Retak'ka who is the original user of BoBoiBoy's elemental powers. He seeks to take back his elemental powers from BoBoiBoy to ...                See full summary »

title: SpongeBob SquarePants
des: The misadventures of a talking sea sponge who works at a fast food restaurant, attends a boating school, and lives in an underwater pineapple.

title: A Goofy Movie
des: When Max makes a preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

title: Archer
des: Covert black ops and espionage take a back seat to zany personalities and relationships between secret agents and drones.

title: Toy Story 3
des: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

title: Hercules
des: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

title: Love, Death & Robots

title: Monsters University
des: A look at the relationship between Mike and Sulley during their days at Monsters University -- when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.

title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
des: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

title: The Jungle Book
des: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

title: Up
des: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

title: Gravity Falls
des: Twin siblings Dipper and Mabel Pines spend the summer at their great-uncle's tourist trap in the enigmatic Gravity Falls, Oregon.

title: Enchanted
des: A young maiden in a land called Andalasia, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York City by an evil queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

title: Beauty and the Beast
des: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

title: Kim Possible
des: A high school cheerleader and her accident-prone best friend balance their duties as global crime-fighters with the typical challenges of adolescence.

title: The Secret Life of Pets 2
des: Continuing the story of Max and his pet friends, following their secret lives after their owners leave them for work or school each day.

title: Big Hero 6
des: The special bond that develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

title: UglyDolls
des: An animated adventure in which the free-spirited UglyDolls confront what it means to be different, struggle with a desire to be loved, and ultimately discover who you truly are is what matters most.

title: The Polar Express
des: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

title: DuckTales
des: The comedy-adventure series chronicles the high-flying adventures of trillionaire Scrooge McDuck, his grandnephews - Huey, Dewey, and Louie - and temperamental nephew Donald Duck, Launchpad McQuack, Mrs. Beakley, and her granddaughter Webby.

title: Soul
des: A musician who has lost his passion for music is transported out of his body and must find his way back with the help of an infant soul learning about herself.

title: Abominable
des: Three teenagers must help a Yeti return to his family while avoiding a wealthy man and a zoologist who want it for their own needs.

title: Spirited Away
des: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

title: Brave
des: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.

title: Undone
des: A woman discovers she has a new relationship with time after surviving a car accident that almost killed her.

title: American Dad!
des: The random escapades of Stan Smith, a conservative C.I.A. Agent dealing with family life, and keeping America safe, all in the most absurd way possible.

title: Robin Hood
des: The story of the legendary outlaw is portrayed with the characters as humanoid animals.

title: The Incredibles
des: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

title: Ralph Breaks the Internet
des: Six years after the events of "Wreck-It Ralph," Ralph and Vanellope, now friends, discover a wi-fi router in their arcade, leading them into a new adventure.

title: X-Men: The Animated Series
des: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: WALL·E
des: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

title: One Punch Man
des: The story of Saitama, a hero that does it just for fun & can defeat his enemies with a single punch.

title: Incredibles 2
des: The Incredibles hero family takes on a new mission, which involves a change in family roles: Bob Parr (Mr Incredible) must manage the house while his wife Helen (Elastigirl) goes out to save the world.

title: Star Wars Resistance
des: Kazuda Xiono, a young pilot for the Resistance, is tasked with a top secret mission to investigate the First Order, a growing threat in the galaxy.

title: Finding Nemo
des: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: Toy Story 2
des: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

title: Final Space
des: An astronaut named Gary and his planet-destroying sidekick called Mooncake embark on serialized journeys through space in order to unlock the mystery of where the universe actually ends and if it actually does exist.

title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
des: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
des: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in WWII.

title: Phineas and Ferb
des: Phineas and Ferb invent, scheme, and stay one step ahead of their bratty sister. Meanwhile, their pet platypus plots against evil Dr. Doofenshmirtz.

title: Shrek
des: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

title: Mulan
des: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

title: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
des: She-Ra, Princess of Power, leads a rebellion to free her land of Etheria from the monstrous invaders the Horde.

title: Hazbin Hotel
des: In attempt to find a non-violent alternative for reducing Hell's overpopulation, the daughter of Lucifer opens a rehabilitation hotel that offers a group of misfit demons a chance at redemption.

title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
des: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.

title: Sing
des: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists find that their lives will never be the same.

title: Futurama
des: Philip J. Fry, a pizza delivery boy, is accidentally frozen in 1999 and thawed out on New Year's Eve 2999.

title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
des: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

title: The Princess and the Frog
des: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

title: Wreck-It Ralph
des: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

title: Oliver & Company
des: A lost and alone kitten joins a gang of dogs engaged in petty larceny in New York City.

title: Disenchantment
des: Princess Tiabeanie, 'Bean', is annoyed at her imminent arranged marriage to Prince Merkimer. Then she meets Luci, a demon, and Elfo, an elf, and things get rather exciting, and dangerous.

title: Spider-Man: The Animated Series
des: A young man with spider-like abilities fights crime as a superhero in New York City while trying to have a normal personal life.

title: Treasure Planet
des: A Disney animated version of "Treasure Island". The only difference is that the film is set in outer space with alien worlds and other galactic wonders.

title: Sleeping Beauty
des: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.

title: The Legend of Korra
des: Avatar Korra fights to keep Republic City safe from the evil forces of both the physical and spiritual worlds.

title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
des: A young adventurer named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

title: Song of the South
des: The kindly story-teller Uncle Remus tells a young boy stories about trickster Br'er Rabbit, who outwits Br'er Fox and slow-witted Br'er Bear.

title: Recess
des: Comic tales of a group of good friends, 4 boys and 2 girls, during breaks in primary school, as they grow up, relate to each other, and have brushes with authority.

title: One Hundred and One Dalmatians
des: When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella de Vil, the parents must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.

title: Naruto: Shippûden
des: Naruto Uzumaki, is a loud, hyperactive, adolescent ninja who constantly searches for approval and recognition, as well as to become Hokage, who is acknowledged as the leader and strongest of all ninja in the village.

title: Pocahontas
des: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.

title: Finding Dory
des: Friendly but forgetful blue tang Dory begins a search for her long-lost parents, and everyone learns a few things about the real meaning of family along the way.

title: Cars 3
des: Lightning McQueen sets out to prove to a new generation of racers that he's still the best race car in the world.

title: Peter Pan
des: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

title: Harley Quinn
des: The series will focus on a newly single Harley Quinn, who sets off to make it on her own in Gotham City.

title: Despicable Me 3
des: Gru meets his long-lost charming, cheerful, and more successful twin brother Dru who wants to team up with him for one last criminal heist.

title: Adventure Time
des: A 12-year-old boy and his best friend, wise 28-year-old dog with magical powers, go on a series of surreal adventures with each other.

title: Coraline
des: An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

title: Playmobil: The Movie
des: Animated feature film inspired by the Playmobil brand toys.

title: Cinderella
des: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq, and from her Fairy Godmother.

title: Hunter x Hunter
des: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness. With his friends and his potential, he seeks for his father who left him when he was younger.

title: Dinosaur
des: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sancturary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

title: Batman: The Animated Series
des: The Dark Knight battles crime in Gotham City with occasional help from Robin and Batgirl.

title: Sausage Party
des: A sausage strives to discover the truth about his existence.

title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
des: It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: Lego Duplo invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild.

title: Trolls
des: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

title: Onward
des: Set in a suburban fantasy world, two teenage elf brothers embark on a quest to discover if there is still magic out there.

title: The Lion King II: Simba's Pride
des: Simba's daughter is the key to a resolution of a bitter feud between Simba's pride and the outcast pride led by the mate of Scar.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
des: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

title: DuckTales
des: The globe-trotting treasure-hunting money-making adventures of billionaire Scrooge McDuck and his nephews.

title: The Rescuers
des: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
des: Marinette and Adrien, two normal teens, transform into superheroes Ladybug and Cat Noir when an evil threatens their city.

title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
des: After the Republic's victory on Christophsis, Anakin and his new apprentice Ahsoka Tano must rescue the kidnapped son of Jabba the Hutt. Political intrigue complicates their mission.

title: The Black Cauldron
des: A young boy and a bunch of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

title: A Christmas Carol
des: An animated retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about a Victorian-era miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

title: Steven Universe
des: A team of intergalactic warriors fights to protect the universe, but the combination of three highly trained beings and one quirky young boy leaves the team struggling to overcome the dangerous scenarios that are put in front of them.

title: The Good Dinosaur
des: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.

title: Lilo & Stitch
des: A Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who is actually a notorious extra-terrestrial fugitive.

title: Darkwing Duck
des: A bumbling superhero battles crime with the help of his daughter and pilot sidekick.

title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
des: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

title: Brother Bear
des: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

title: The Little Mermaid 2: Return to the Sea
des: To protect her from a sea witch, Ariel's daughter is not allowed in the ocean; but when she becomes 12, she runs away to an adventure under the sea.

title: Sesame Street
des: On a special inner city street, the inhabitants, human and muppet, teach preschool subjects with comedy, cartoons, games, and songs.

title: The Emperor's New Groove
des: Emperor Kuzco (David Spade) is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma (Eartha Kitt), and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha (John Goodman), the gentle llama herder.

title: Pinocchio
des: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

title: Rise of the Guardians
des: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

title: King of the Hill
des: A straight laced propane salesman in Arlen, Texas tries to deal with the wacky antics of his family and friends, while also trying to keep his son in line.

title: Castlevania
des: A vampire hunter fights to save a besieged city from an army of otherworldly creatures controlled by Dracula.

title: Peter Rabbit
des: Feature adaptation of Beatrix Potter's classic tale of a rebellious rabbit trying to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden.

title: Alice in Wonderland
des: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

title: The Rescuers Down Under
des: The R.A.S. agents, Miss Bianca and Bernard, race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

title: The Fox and the Hound
des: Two childhood friends find themselves forced to become enemies.

title: Naruto
des: Naruto Uzumaki, a mischievous adolescent ninja, struggles as he searches for recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the village's leader and strongest ninja.

title: Arctic Dogs
des: An Arctic fox works in the mailroom of a package delivery service, but wants to be doing the deliveries.

title: Isle of Dogs
des: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

title: Fantasia
des: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.

title: Anastasia
des: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

title: Tangled: The Series
des: Set between Walt Disney Animation Studios' "Tangled" and its short film "Tangled Ever After," this animated adventure/comedy series unfolds as Rapunzel acquaints herself with her parents, her kingdom and the people of Corona.

title: Kung Fu Panda
des: The Dragon Warrior has to clash against the savage Tai Lung as China's fate hangs in the balance. However, the Dragon Warrior mantle is supposedly mistaken to be bestowed upon an obese panda who is a novice in martial arts.

title: The Sword in the Stone
des: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
des: Unlike Naruto, Boruto is about a son who's living his life along his friend, avoiding being in his father's shadow. He has adventures in younger version, in school, revealing new abilities.

title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
des: When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.

title: James and the Giant Peach
des: An orphan, who lives with his two cruel aunts, befriends anthropomorphic bugs who live inside a giant peach, and they embark on a journey to New York City.

title: Mr. Pickles
des: The Goodman family lives with their lovable pet dog, Mr. Pickles, a deviant border collie with a secret satanic streak.

title: Primal
des: Primal features a caveman at the dawn of evolution. A dinosaur on the brink of extinction. Bonded by tragedy, this unlikely friendship becomes the only hope of survival in a violent, primordial world.

title: Aladdin and the Return of Jafar
des: Jafar comes for revenge on Aladdin, using a foolish thief and Iago's treachery to find a way back into power.

title: Flushed Away
des: The story of an uptown rat that gets flushed down the toilet from his penthouse apartment, ending in the sewers of London, where he has to learn a whole new and different way of life.

title: Cars 2
des: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

title: A Shaun the Sheep Movie: Farmageddon
des: When an alien with amazing powers crash-lands near Mossy Bottom Farm, Shaun the Sheep goes on a mission to shepherd the intergalactic visitor home before a sinister organization can capture her.

title: TaleSpin
des: Baloo the Bear from the Jungle Book is cast as a 1930s Pacific Islands bush pilot.

title: Star Wars: Clone Wars
des: The events and battles of the Galactic Republic's last major war are recounted.

title: Aladdin and the King of Thieves
des: The King of Thieves disrupts Aladdin and Jasmine's long-anticipated wedding, looking for an oracle that will lead him to an even bigger treasure. His true identity causes trouble for Aladdin.

title: The Adventures of Tintin
des: Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.

title: Dragon Ball Z
des: After learning that he is from another planet, a warrior named Goku and his friends are prompted to defend it from an onslaught of extraterrestrial enemies.

title: Adventures of the Gummi Bears
des: A group of reclusive humanoid bears and a few trusted humans explore their lost heritage and prevent their enemies from exploiting it.

title: Chip 'n' Dale Rescue Rangers
des: Disney's fun-loving chipmunks are re-imagined as the leaders of a team of pint-sized crime-fighters, rounding out the team are two mice, Gadget Hackwrench and Monterey Jack and Zipper, a fly.

title: Dumbo
des: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

title: Pokémon
des: Follows the adventure of Satoshi with his Pokemon, Pikachu and his friends to become the Pokemon master.

title: Arthur Christmas
des: Santa's clumsy son Arthur sets out on a mission with St. Nick's father to give out a present they misplaced to a young girl in less than 2 hours.

title: The Great Mouse Detective
des: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy-maker and uncovers its link to his arch-enemy, Professor Ratigan.

title: Despicable Me
des: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

title: Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation
des: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family.

title: Shrek 2
des: Princess Fiona's parents invite her and Shrek to dinner to celebrate her marriage. If only they knew the newlyweds were both ogres.

title: The Star
des: A small but brave donkey and his animal friends become the unsung heroes of the first Christmas.

title: Missing Link
des: Mr. Link recruits explorer Sir Lionel Frost to help find his long-lost relatives in the fabled valley of Shangri-La. Along with adventurer Adelina Fortnight, this trio of explorers travel the world to help their new friend.

title: Ice Age

Princess Fiona, however, rallies a band of royal girlfriends to fend off a coup d'etat by the jilted Prince Charming.

des: Add a Plot
